job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, even if AI-related, is a software development task focused on integration and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, which aligns with the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes self-sufficiency and the ability to overcome obstacles independently, which is a key aspect of problem-solving and pragmatism.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support processes and improving existing AI systems (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration'). While there's mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' (Macro-Category B), the primary emphasis is on the application and improvement of AI within a support system rather than core AI model development or GenAI specialization. The role is about using AI to enhance a service, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to integrating and improving AI systems within a customer support context. The distinction between core AI development and application/integration is evident. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the 'fine-tuning' aspect could lean slightly more towards B, but the overall framing is A-dominant.
